title: King Khan: Hate him, Love him, but cannot ignore him
text:
United Kingdom's University of Edinburg honoured Shah Rukh Khan with a doctorate degree on October 15. He received the award for his philanthropic work and global recognition
We know him as one of the wittiest as well as the most inspiring personality of recent times. His speech at Edinburg University also received much applause. Here are few inspiring Quote: s that SRK delivered and is the most motivational one.
1. "Don't become a philosopher before you become rich."
2. "Don't let your fears become boxes that enclose you. Open them out, feel them and turn them into the greatest courage you are capable of."
3. "It's OK to be confused. Confusion is the route to all the clarity in the world."
4. "Art is more important than the artist - have no attachment to your own art - it's regressive, move on."
5. Study hard. Work hard. Play harder. Don't be bound by rules. Don't hurt anybody, and never ever live somebody else's dream.
6. Chak De India taught me that whatever it is that is pulling you back, is not going away unless you stand up and start forging your own path with all your might in the opposite direction. Stop whining and start moving.
